delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

rename.title: Rename Conversation
rename.description: Please enter a new name for the conversation.

cleanMessages.title: Clear All Messages
cleanMessages.description: This will delete all messages and files in this conversation. Are you sure you want to continue?

fork.title: Create Branch
fork.description: This will copy all messages from the first message to the current message into a new conversation where you can continue the dialogue.

message.reasoning: Enabling reasoning will automatically disable function calling. This is a limitation of DeepSeek-V3.1 models, and both features cannot be used simultaneously. Continue?
message.functionCall: Enabling function calling will automatically disable reasoning. This is a limitation of DeepSeek-V3.1 models, and both features cannot be used simultaneously. Continue?

warningText.reasoning: Note: Enabling reasoning will automatically disable function calling, which is a requirement of DeepSeek-V3.1 models.
warningText.functionCall: Note: Enabling function calling will automatically disable reasoning, which is a requirement of DeepSeek-V3.1 models.
